_comment: This file contains metadata for the Aralia RPG application. The `requestFramePermissions` key can include values like 'camera' or 'microphone' to request device access. The `prompt` key can be used for system-level instructions or context.
name: Aralia RPG v0.3.21 (village)
description: A text-based fantasy RPG powered by Gemini, where your choices shape the adventure in the world of Krynn. This version adds the 'Levitate' spell to the game's data and glossary.
